name: 诡仙志异
description:
Gui Xian Zhi Yi is a survival pigeon-like game with a strange self-cultivation style. You need to learn all kinds of exercises and sacrificing magic weapons to strengthen yourself in a hundred years, in order to survive the catastrophe and successfully break through to the next level. high realm.

main features:
The free combination of characters, spiritual roots and natal instruments, everything is possible!

Characters with different styles!
Invincible in a short time, fast displacement... Each character has its own special skills, and you can choose a style more suitable for you by adding talents!
Offensive and defensive anti-damage shield? Have! More stable and lasting defense capabilities? Have! More fault-tolerant resilience? Have!
Choose your favorite talents to build your unique gameplay!
(The current version has a total of two characters)

An indispensable spiritual root for cultivators!
Chisha, Life Breath, Quiet Spring, Burning Skeleton, Nether Dust... Different spiritual roots have different powers, burning, explosion, poison, recovery... According to the difference in your cultivation focus, even if it is the same spiritual root It can also play a different role!
(The current version has two kinds of spiritual roots)

Evolvable natal magic weapon!
Each natal magic weapon has different characteristics, and with the continuous beheading of the enemy, the natal magic weapon will become stronger and stronger, ordinary weapon, magic weapon, magic weapon, acquired, innate! Powerful instruments will help you go further on the road of seeking the Way!

There are 30,000,000 things in Taoism!
Without the need for complex synthesis formulas, every exercise and every magic weapon can reach the realm of enlightenment under the right opportunity, and obtain an earth-shaking strengthening effect.
